targets.query: from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_idle") |> last() |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value })) |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_idle")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: date.nanosecond(t: now()) - date.nanosecond(t: r._time)) / 1000000000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_idle") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value })) |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent") |> last() |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: date.nanosecond(t: now()) - date.nanosecond(t: r._time)) / 1000000000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.path == "${mount}") |> last() |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","path"])

import "date"
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent" and r.path == "${mount}")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: date.nanosecond(t: now()) - date.nanosecond(t: r._time)) / 1000000000.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","path"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent") |> group(columns:["path"], mode: "by") |> last() |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","path"]) |> sort(columns:["path"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "read_bytes") |> derivative(unit: v.windowPeriod, nonNegative: true) |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","name"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio" and r._field == "write_bytes") |> derivative(unit: v.windowPeriod, nonNegative: true) |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","name"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "load1")  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "load5")  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "load15") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value"])

list.name: mount
list.label: Select mount(s)
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(bucket: "${bucket}", tag: "path", predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and r._field == "used_percent", start: -24h)
  |> keep(columns:["_value"]) |> unique() |> sort()
